root: ^Pheww, what a day... Time to pack my stuff and go!

look: ^We finally finished cleaning the store. It still smells like hot cinnamon buns in here... Reminds me of my mom's. I'm lucky I landed this internship ! But I should be going now. Time to pack my stuff and go.
breakroom: ^omg sorry we didn't mean to scare you
^Hello, apologies indeed. We wanted to express our excitement for your week of internship. It is very nice meeting you, my name is Inky.
^mine's Squilliam!! i am THRILLED to finally meet you!!! i hope we'll become best besties very soon!!!!
^AND I'M THE ONE AND ONLY LIL' SOUP!!
^HELL YEAH, AND THAT'S MY HOMIE, BEST GIRL YUZU!!

s: ^What a warm welcome, nice to meet you too! I can't wait to get to know you better.
^Uhhh, nice to meet y'all I guess...?
^You are too cute I can't believe you can run a bakery on your own!

dubious: ^uh-oh, i think i smell massive WEIRD vibes over here :o)
^Come on Squill, not cool. There's already a lot to unpack here. Also, you're scaring the intern. We need their help... or else we will never deliver our delicious snacks on time.

s: ^I don't think I've seen a time limit there. Customers just love seeing you wiggling around to bake some snacks. It's very cute to watch.

cute: ^to be fair, i can't believe it either! why we do have to work instead of living like the cutesies we are?? unfair! booo capitalism!!
^Do you even... work here? Most of you fall asleep all the time anyway...
^INKY AT BAT AND STRIKES AGAIN, SAVING US FROM BANKRUPTCY!! LEZZZZGO INK-DAWGGG!
breakroom2: ^Hehe right, anyway it's very nice to have you here and help us with our bakery business.
^... Sometimes we struggle a little I must say...
^but we put a lot of heart into it and that's what people like about our shop! am I right?

s: ^The true bakery is the friends we made along the way.

^"Don't lower your expectations to meet your performance. Raise your level of performance to meet your expectations. Expect the best of yourself, and then do what is necessary to make it a reality." Ralph Marston
^The lion doesn't concern himself with the respect of deadlines or safety measures.

dedication: ^Sure, sure, dedication, hard-work, organization, communication skills, clean hands, face moisturizer and a million bucks sure make the dream work...
^You nod with pensively, reflecting on the lifestyle you could have had if you were not an intern at a bakery...
friends: ^ALL MY HOMIES LOVE WORKING AT THE BAKERY!!
^You flex your biceps in a totally cool and socially acceptable way.
ralph: ^is ralph a bestie of yours or?
lion: ^You don't really look like a lion...
^In fact I hope you will feel concerned about the respect of deadlines and safety measures. Or else, you can't really work here...

s: ^No worries, I was just joking. I will respect deadlines and safety measures.

ending: ^Alright folks, I guess that's all for tonight. If everyone is done, we can head home!

b: ^ also before you leave, my apologies for earlier... i guess i got some zoomies from meeting someone new! please forgive me and be my friend!!
^ Also, you seem like a very sweet person. Kind-hearted and gentle. That's nice.
^ Oh and by the way, I like the serious 'vibes' you bring to the table. Very focused, very demure.

ending: ^Okay then... Thanks everyone!! Let's bounce !!! See you tomorrow!!!
